A

addCard(Card) - Method in class Hand
Adds a card to the hand.
addCardSafety(Hand, Card) - Method in class ErrorHandler
Safely adds a card to a hand, handling any errors.

C

Card - Class in Unnamed Package
Represents a playing card with a rank and suit.
Card(String, String) - Constructor for class Card
Creates a new card with the specified rank and suit.
clear() - Method in class Hand
Removes all cards from the hand.
ConsoleIO - Class in Unnamed Package
Handles all console input/output operations for the Blackjack game.
ConsoleIO(Scanner) - Constructor for class ConsoleIO
Creates a new ConsoleIO instance with the specified input scanner.

D

Deals a card from the shoe.

E

ErrorHandler - Class in Unnamed Package
Handles error conditions in the Blackjack game.
ErrorHandler(ConsoleIO) - Constructor for class ErrorHandler
Creates a new ErrorHandler with the specified ConsoleIO.

G

Game - Class in Unnamed Package
Main game class that controls the flow of the Blackjack game.
Game(int, ConsoleIO, ErrorHandler) - Constructor for class Game
Creates a new Blackjack game.

Safely gets a card from a hand by index, handling any errors.

getHandValue() - Method in class Participant
Gets the current value of the participant's hand.

Gets the rank of the card.
getScore() - Method in class Participant
Gets the participant's current score.
getValue() - Method in class Hand
Calculates the Blackjack value of the hand.

H

Hand - Class in Unnamed Package
Represents a hand of cards in the Blackjack game.
Hand() - Constructor for class Hand
Creates a new empty hand with capacity for 12 cards.

P

Participant - Class in Unnamed Package
Represents a participant in the Blackjack game (player or dealer).
Participant() - Constructor for class Participant
Creates a new participant with an empty hand and zero score.
printDealerBust() - Method in class ConsoleIO
Announces that the dealer has busted.
printDealerDealtCards() - Method in class ConsoleIO
Indicates that the dealer has dealt cards.
printDealerDrewCard(Card) - Method in class ConsoleIO
Announces a card drawn by the dealer.
printDealerDrewClosedCard() - Method in class ConsoleIO
Announces that the dealer revealed their closed card.
printDealerHasBlackjack() - Method in class ConsoleIO
Announces that the dealer has Blackjack.
printDealerTurn() - Method in class ConsoleIO
Announces the start of the dealer's turn.
printDealerWon() - Method in class ConsoleIO
Announces that the dealer has won.
printErrorHandFull() - Method in class ConsoleIO
Prints an error message for a full hand.
printErrorInvalidCardIndex() - Method in class ConsoleIO
Prints an error message for an invalid card index.
printErrorShoeOutOfCards() - Method in class ConsoleIO
Prints an error message for an empty shoe.

Prints welcome message at the start of the game.
printHitOrStand() - Method in class ConsoleIO
Prompts the player to hit or stand.

Announces that the player has reached 21.

printPlayerWon() - Method in class ConsoleIO

Announces a tie game (push).

Displays the round number header.

S

Shoe - Class in Unnamed Package
Represents a shoe of multiple decks of cards used in Blackjack.
Shoe(int) - Constructor for class Shoe
Creates a new shoe with the specified number of decks.
shuffle() - Method in class Shoe
Shuffles the cards in the shoe using the Fisher-Yates algorithm.

Starts the game by displaying a welcome message and playing the first round.
